name: Weird Game: I Rely On Billions Of Merit Points To Clear Game
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhwa
content: The Original Sin game has invaded our reality, upending everyone’s lives. Lin Guoyun, whose parents mysteriously vanished, has been chosen as the game’s ultimate VIP, granted unlimited spending power. Within Original Sin, peril lurks around every corner: bizarre incidents, strange creatures, and random dungeon challenges.
